children.name: Introduction
Monitor and analyze your Cycle Times

blocks.text: This Dashboard focuses on the overall end-to-end time of a standard Procure-to-Pay (PTP) process as well as shows the cycle time for various portions of the process (subprocess cycle time), this breakdown can be used to identify bottlenecks in your process.
Page 1 - Overview: Key metrics to get a picture of the health of Procure-to-Pay cycle time.
Page 2 - Deep Dive: Deep dive into further analysis of your cycle time
Page 3 - Case Details: A list of Case details in order to look further into root causes.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Overview
Average Cycle Time
children.description: Time taken from 'Create PO Item' to 'Create FI Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' ~> 'Create FI Invoice')

children.name: Ø Cycle Time of PO Creation and Release
children.description: Time taken from 'Create PO item' to 'Release PO'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Release PO'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Cycle Time to Goods Receipt
children.description: Time taken from 'Release PO' to 'Create Good Receipt'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Goods Receipt'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Release PO')))) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Cycle Time to Clear Invoice
children.description: Time taken from 'Create FI Invoice' to 'Clear Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice')))) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: % of Cases executed in a given Time
children.description: Time Threshold is set to 14 Days. To update this, go to Metrics.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
        	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Goods Receipt')) 
	- FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Release PO'))) 
        	< DURATION '14days') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Processing Time
children.description: Time taken from 'Create PO Item' to 'Create Goods Receipt'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Goods Receipt')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ø Confirmation Time for PRs
children.description: Time Taken form 'Create PR Item' to 'Create PO Item'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PR Item'))) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle Time Process discovery
Ø Cycle Time of Goods Receipt to Create Invoice
children.description: Time taken from 'Create Goods Receipt' to 'Create FI Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Deep Dive
Ø Cycle Time by Company Code

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Cases", 
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time"
    ,"PO Company Code"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Company Code" IS NOT NULL
	AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice') 
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Ø Cycle Time by PO Plant

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Cases", 
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time",
	"PO Item Plant Name"
  
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

children.name: Ø Cycle Time by PO Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Cases", 
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time",
	"PO Type" 
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Type" IS NOT NULL AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

children.name: Ø Cycle Time Over Time
children.description: Definition: We measure the average cycle time from PO Creation until Invoice Creation for all cases that have been started within a specific month

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
        
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time"
        	
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Ø Cycle Time and No. of PO Items by Vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT("case_id") AS "# PO items",
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time",
	"PO Vendor Name"  AS "Vendor" 

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Vendor Name" IS NOT NULL 
AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

children.name: Sub Process Cycle Time Analysis by Company Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"PO Company Name", 
    COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Cases",
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) 
	AS "AVG Cycle Time",
    
	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PR Item')) ))
	) AS "Confirmation time for PRs" , 
	
    AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
	) AS "Processing time for POs", 

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Release PO')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
	) AS "PO Creation to PO Release", 
	
    AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Release PO')) ))
	) AS "PO Released to Goods Receipt",

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')) ))
	) AS "Goods Receipt to Create FI Invoice",

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Clear Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')) ))
	) AS "Create FI Invoice to Clear Invoice"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Company Name" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Sub Process Cycle Time Analysis by Company Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
    'Overall Average' AS "PO Company Name",
    COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Cases",
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))) 
	AS "AVG Cycle Time",
    
	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PR Item')) ))
	) AS "Confirmation time for PRs" , 
	
    AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
	) AS "Processing time for POs", 

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Release PO')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
	) AS "PO Creation to PO Release", 
	
    AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Release PO')) ))
	) AS "PO Released to Goods Receipt",

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Goods Receipt')) ))
	) AS "Goods Receipt to Create FI Invoice",

	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Clear Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create FI Invoice')) ))
	) AS "Create FI Invoice to Clear Invoice"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Company Name" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Case Details
Case Details

dataSource.query:
SELECT
 case_id AS "PO Number"
,"PO Vendor Name"
,"PO Vendor Number"

--  all date fields
,"Last FI Invoice Receipt Date" AS "Invoice Receipt Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Posting Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount 1 Due Date" AS "CD due date 1"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount 2 Due Date" AS "CD due date 2"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"

-- aggregated KPIs
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG("Last FI Invoice Posting Date" - "Last FI Invoice Receipt Date") AS "avg time invoice receipt to posting"
,AVG("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" - "Last FI Invoice Posting Date") AS "avg time posting to clearing"
,AVG("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" - "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date") AS "No. of days paid late"

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 3 desc
LIMIT 500
